content.html: You wouldn’t expect an affected user to fix your broken website, so don’t expect Black folks to fix your racism. There are books you can read and research you can do. There ARE experts who can help you. Stop saying you know you need to do better, and find them, and pay for them.
content.value:
You wouldn’t expect an affected user to fix your broken website, so don’t expect Black folks to fix your racism.

There are books you can read and research you can do. There ARE experts who can help you. Stop saying you know you need to do better, and find them, and pay for them.
